mapper.select: select * from ( select grn, partNumber, printQTY, rid, plent, GRNDATE, GRN103, UpAegisDATE from vendorrid where convert(varchar(10),GRNDATE,23) between ${currentDate} and ${dateSub2} and printQTY != 0.0 and plent in ('1100','5000') union select grn, partNumber, printQTY, rid, plent, GRNDATE, GRN103, UpAegisDATE from pcbvendorrid where convert(varchar(10),GRNDATE,23) between ${currentDate} and ${dateSub2} and printQTY <> 0.0 and plent in ('1100','5000') )m order by grn, partNumber
